81  class DoubleWhitening : public AlgoBase {
82  public:

102 
109  void operator<<(SeqViewDouble &Data) {
110  Dmatrix *in = Data.GetData();
111 
112  if (in->size1() != 1) {
113  LogSevere("DoubleWhitening: multichannels not implemented resize");
114  throw bad_matrix_size("Wrong Matrix size");
115  }
116 
117  SetData(*in, Data.GetScale());
118 
119  if (mFirstCall) {
120  mFirstCall = false;
121  mStartTime = Data.GetStart();
122  mSampling = Data.GetSampling();
123  }
124  }
125 
126  void operator>>(SeqViewDouble &outdata) {
127  Dmatrix *out = outdata.GetData();
128  out->resize(1, mOutputSize);
129  GetData(*out);
130  outdata.SetStart(mStartTime);
131  outdata.SetSampling(mSampling);
132  outdata.SetScale(1.0);
133  mStartTime += mSampling * mOutputSize;
134  }
135 
136  DoubleWhitening& Input(SeqViewDouble &Data);
137 
138  DoubleWhitening& Output(SeqViewDouble &outdata);

140 
141  void Load(const char *filename, const char *fmt = "txt") {
142  eternity::xml_archive fa;
143  fa.open(filename, eternity::archive::load);
144  xml_serialize(fa, "");
145  fa.close();
146  }
147 
148  void Save(const char *filename, const char *fmt = "txt") {
149  eternity::xml_archive fa;
150  fa.open(filename, eternity::archive::store);
151  xml_serialize(fa, "");
152  fa.close();
153  }
154 
155  void xml_serialize(eternity::xml_archive &xml, const char *p) {
156  char buffer[1024];
157 
158  if (xml.is_loading()) {
159 
160  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mBuffer", p);
161  mBuffer.xml_serialize(xml, buffer);
162  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mFirstCall", p);
163  BOOL_XML_SERIALIZE(mFirstCall, xml, buffer);
164  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mOutputSize", p);
165  xml.read(buffer, mOutputSize, 0);
166  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mTotSize", p);
167  xml.read(buffer, mTotSize, 0);
168  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mOrder", p);
169  xml.read(buffer, mOrder, 0);
170  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mStartTime", p);
171  xml.read(buffer, mStartTime, 0);
172  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mSampling", p);
173  xml.read(buffer, mSampling, 0);
174  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mParcorF", p);
175  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mParcorF, xml, buffer);
176  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mParcorB", p);
177  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mParcorB, xml, buffer);
178  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mErrF", p);
179  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mErrF, xml, buffer);
180  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mErrB", p);
181  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mErrB, xml, buffer);
182  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mStatus", p);
183  xml.read(buffer, mStatus, 0);
184  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mEf", p);
185  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mEf, xml, buffer);
186  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mEb", p);
187  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mEb, xml, buffer);
188  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mWhitened", p);
189  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mWhitened, xml, buffer);
190 
191 
192  } else {
193 
194  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mBuffer", p);
195  mBuffer.xml_serialize(xml, buffer);
196  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mFirstCall", p);
197  BOOL_XML_SERIALIZE(mFirstCall, xml, buffer);
198  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mOutputSize", p);
199  xml.write(buffer, mOutputSize);
200  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mTotSize", p);
201  xml.write(buffer, mTotSize);
202  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mOrder", p);
203  xml.write(buffer, mOrder);
204  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mStartTime", p);
205  xml.write(buffer, mStartTime);
206  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mSampling", p);
207  xml.write(buffer, mSampling);
208  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mParcorF", p);
209  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mParcorF, xml, buffer);
210  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mParcorB", p);
211  DVECTOR_XML_SERIALIZE(mParcorB, xml, buffer);
212  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mErrF", p);
213  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mErrF, xml, buffer);
214  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mErrB", p);
215  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mErrB, xml, buffer);
216  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mStatus", p);
217  xml.write(buffer, mStatus);
218  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mEf", p);
219  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mEf, xml, buffer);
220  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mEb", p);
221  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mEb, xml, buffer);
222  snprintf(buffer, 1024, "%s.mWhitened", p);
223  DMATRIX_XML_SERIALIZE(mWhitened, xml, buffer);
224 
225 
226  }
227  }
